text: Arau te'omloke (praraesa karai) ka’ba, ‘sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala allahara babe, yijane amara prati te'omra pratisrauti satya hicape bastabayita karaiche arau amaka e'i bhumira adhikarai karaile, ami jannatata ya’te iccha ta’te'i basabasara tha'i karai lama’. Eteke (coraa) neka amalakarai sakalara puraskara kimana ye uttama
